name: Italian Chicken Panini
author: Michelle
summary: My mother made up this Italian chicken panini recipe and it is delicious.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
¼ pound sliced cooked chicken breast
directions: Preheat an electric grill (such as George Foreman®) for medium heat
Spread olive oil on one side of each bread slice
Place one slice of bread, oil-side down, on the preheated grill
Spread 1/2 of the pesto on the bread and put a slice of mozzarella cheese over top
Arrange chicken over the cheese and top with remaining mozzarella
Spread remaining pesto on the other slice of bread and place on top of the sandwich
Close the grill and cook until cheese is melted and bread is golden brown and crispy, about 4 minutes
